title: A millisecond quantum memory for scalable quantum networks
title_cn: 用于可伸缩量子网络的毫秒级量子存储器

title_cn: 真空拉比共振的非线性响应

title_cn: 观察两个原子之间的Rydberg封锁

title_cn: 在里德堡封锁体系中观察到两个单独原子的集体激发

title: Energy gaps in the failed high-Tc superconductor La1.875Ba0.125CuO4
title_cn: 失效的高Tc超导体La1.875Ba0.125CuO4的能隙

title: Attosecond phase locking of harmonics emitted from laser-produced plasmas
title_cn: 从激光产生的等离子体发出的谐波的亚秒锁相

title: Sub-ångström-resolution diffractive imaging of single nanocrystals
title_cn: 亚纳米分辨率的单个纳米晶体衍射成像

title: Simplifying quantum logic using higher-dimensional Hilbert spaces
title_cn: 使用高维希尔伯特空间简化量子逻辑
abstract: Quantum computation promises to solve fundamental, yet otherwise intractable, problems across a range of active fields of research. Recently, universal quantum logic-gate sets—the elemental building blocks for a quantum computer—have been demonstrated in several physical architectures. A serious obstacle to a full-scale implementation is the large number of these gates required to build even small quantum circuits. Here, we present and demonstrate a general technique that harnesses multi-level information carriers to significantly reduce this number, enabling the construction of key quantum circuits with existing technology. We present implementations of two key quantum circuits: the three-qubit Toffoli gate and the general two-qubit controlled-unitary gate. Although our experiment is carried out in a photonic architecture, the technique is independent of the particular physical encoding of quantum information, and has the potential for wider application.
abstract_cn: 量子计算有望解决一系列活跃研究领域中的根本性问题，但这些问题还是棘手的。 近来，在几种物理体系结构中已经证明了通用量子逻辑门集“量子计算机的基本构造块”。 全面实施的一个严重障碍是建立甚至很小的量子电路都需要大量的这些门。 在这里，我们介绍并演示了一种利用多级信息载体来显着减少该数量的通用技术，从而可以利用现有技术构建关键的量子电路。 我们介绍了两个关键量子电路的实现：三量子位的托菲利门和普通的二量子位的受控unit门。 尽管我们的实验是在光子体系结构中进行的，但该技术与量子信息的特定物理编码无关，并且有可能被更广泛地应用。

title: A key role for unusual spin dynamics in ferropnictides
title_cn: 亚铁氰化物异常旋转动力学的关键作用
abstract: The discovery of high-Tc ferropnictides introduced a new family of superconductors, and has already revealed a complicated and often contradictory picture of the structural and magnetic properties. An almost unprecedented sensitivity of the calculated magnetism and Fermi surface to structural details prevents correspondence to experiment. Experimental probes of the order parameter are in surprisingly strong disagreement, even considering the relative immaturity of the field. We outline various and seemingly contradictory evidence, both theoretical and experimental, and show it can be rectified by assuming a large-moment spin density wave, well defined but with magnetic twin and antiphase boundaries, dynamic on the experimental timescale. Under this assumption, calculations can accurately reproduce even very fine details of the structure, and a natural explanation for the temperature separation of structural and magnetic transitions is provided. Thus, our theory restores agreement between experiment and theory in crucial areas, making further cooperative progress possible on both fronts.
abstract_cn: 高T c 亚铁氰化物的发现引入了一个新的超导体家族，并且已经揭示了结构和磁特性的复杂且常常相互矛盾的图景。计算出的磁性和费米表面对结构细节的几乎前所未有的敏感性阻止了与实验的对应。即使考虑到磁场的相对不成熟，阶次参数的实验性研究也存在令人惊讶的强烈分歧。我们概述了理论上和实验上各种看似矛盾的证据，并表明可以通过假设一个大矩的自旋密度波来纠正它，该自旋密度波定义明确，但具有磁性孪晶和反相边界，在实验时标上是动态的。在这种假设下，计算甚至可以精确地再现非常细微的结构细节，并且为结构和磁跃迁的温度分离提供了自然的解释。因此，我们的理论在关键领域恢复了实验与理论之间的共识，从而使双方在这方面的进一步合作成为可能。

title: Diffraction-limited performance and focusing of high harmonics from relativistic plasmas
title_cn: 衍射极限性能和相对论等离子体的高次谐波聚焦
abstract: When a pulse of light reflects from a mirror that is travelling close to the speed of light, Einstein’s theory of relativity predicts that it will be up-shifted to a substantially higher frequency and compressed to a much shorter duration. This scenario is realized by the relativistically oscillating plasma surface generated by an ultraintense laser focused onto a solid target. Until now, it has been unclear whether the conditions necessary to exploit such phenomena can survive such an extreme interaction with increasing laser intensity. Here, we provide the first quantitative evidence to suggest that they can. We show that the occurrence of surface smoothing on the scale of the wavelength of the generated harmonics, and plasma denting of the irradiated surface, enables the production of high-quality X-ray beams focused down to the diffraction limit. These results improve the outlook for generating extreme X-ray fields, which could in principle extend to the Schwinger limit.
abstract_cn: 当光脉冲从接近光速的反射镜反射时，爱因斯坦的相对论预测它会升频到实质上更高的频率，并压缩到更短的持续时间。这种情况是通过聚焦在固体靶标上的超强激光产生的相对论振动等离子体表面来实现的。直到现在，还不清楚利用这种现象所必需的条件是否能够随着激光强度的增加而经受住这种极端的相互作用。在这里，我们提供了第一个定量证据表明它们可以。我们表明，在产生的谐波的波长范围内发生表面平滑，以及受辐射表面的等离子体凹陷，使得能够产生聚焦到衍射极限的高质量X射线束。这些结果改善了产生极端X射线场的前景，原则上可以扩展到Schwinger极限。

title: Tuning intermolecular interaction in long-range-ordered submonolayer organic films
title_cn: 调节长程亚单层有机薄膜中的分子间相互作用
abstract: The future success of organic electronic devices strongly depends on the ability to tailor the properties of thin films and interfaces. This calls for well-ordered thin films. However, their properties are dominantly influenced by the formation of the first molecular layer representing a template for further growth. The development of the first layer—in turn—depends on the fine balance of molecule–substrate and molecule–molecule interaction. The latter is usually attractive owing to van der Waals forces and causes the formation of islands and small crystalline grains. Here, we report on organic adsorbates exhibiting a repulsive intermolecular interaction. With increasing coverage, Sn-phthalocyanine molecules continuously rearrange on Ag(111) in a series of ordered superstructures. They always fill the surface terraces homogeneously and maximize the domain size. Thicker films also exhibit extremely large, monocrystalline grains and potentially enable bulk-like properties for thin films. The intermolecular interaction can be tuned by cooling and becomes attractive below ∼120 K.
abstract_cn: 有机电子设备的未来成功在很大程度上取决于调整薄膜和界面特性的能力。这需要有序的薄膜。然而，它们的性质主要受到代表进一步生长的模板的第一分子层的形成的影响。第一层的发展又取决于分子基质和分子相互作用的精细平衡。后者通常由于范德华力而具有吸引力，并导致形成岛状物和小晶粒。在这里，我们报告有机吸附物表现出排斥性的分子间相互作用。随着覆盖率的增加，Sn-酞菁分子在Ag（111）上以一系列有序的超结构连续重排。它们总是均匀地填充表面阶地并最大化区域尺寸。较厚的膜还表现出非常大的单晶晶粒，并可能使薄膜具有块状特性。分子间的相互作用可以通过冷却来调节，并且在＆＃8764; 120＆＃8201; K以下变得有吸引力。
